    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:61162dbdcc8638409c92c4cbdeef245c7622f5ff</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>61162dbdcc8638409c92c4cbdeef245c7622f5ff</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Hääli ja kirjuta - esitlus</string>
            <string language="en">Say and Write - presentation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sagen Sie und schreiben Sie - Darstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dites et écrivez - la présentation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diga e escreva - a apresentação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dica e scriva - la presentazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέστε και γράψτε - παρουσίαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diga y escriba - la presentación</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Harjutus on esitatud PowerPointi esitlusena. Eesmärgiks on harjutada ja kinnistada sõnade häälimist ning kirjutamist.</string>
            <string language="en">Vocabulary test. Rhyming words, finding and writing the words. Form 1, 1st stage of teaching. Electronic worksheet. Writing into Excel table. Also possible to use as a printout.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">aabitsaperiood</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
            <string language="en">Primer</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatztest. Reimende Wörter, die 
Wörter finden und schreiben. Bilden Sie 1, 1. Stadium des 
Unterrichtens. Elektronischer Bogen. Das Schreiben in 
übertreffen Tabelle. Auch möglich, als PRINTOUT zu verwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai de vocabulaire. Mots rimants, trouvant
et écrivant les mots. Formez 1, la 1ère étape de 
l'enseignement. Tableau électronique. L'inscription dans 
excellent la table. En outre possible d'utiliser comme 
impression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste do vocabulário. Palavras rimando, 
encontrando e escrevendo as palavras. Dê forma a 1, 1o estágio
de ensinar. Folha eletrônica. Escrever em excel a tabela.
Também possível usar-se como um impresso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova di vocabolario. Parole di rima, 
trovando e scrivendo le parole. Formi 1, prima fase di 
istruzione. Foglio di lavoro elettronico. Scrivendo in 
eccelle la tabella. Inoltre possibile usare come tabulato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξέταση λεξιλογίου. Ομοιοκαταληκτώντας λέξεις, 
βρίσκοντας και γράφοντας τις λέξεις. Μορφή 1, 1$ο στάδιο 
της διδασκαλίας. Ηλεκτρονικό φύλλο εργασίας. Γράψιμο 
στον πίνακα Excel. Επίσης πιθανός να χρησιμοποιήσει ως 
έντυπο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prueba del vocabulario. Palabras de rima, 
encontrando y escribiendo las palabras. Forme 1, 1ra etapa de la
enseñanza. Hoja de trabajo electrónica. El escribir en 
sobresale el vector. También posible utilizar como informe de 
ejecución.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zündkapsel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage estonien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amorce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuola Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua estone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Iniettore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
